Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: Supertetrahedral cages with open metal sites

Other Information.Additional Info: Adsorption capacity: 240 cm³/g at 77 K and 1 bar
Adsorption capacity: 270 cm³/g at 77 K and 1 bar

Sieving Mechanism: Chemical affinity quantum sieving due to open metal sites and supertetrahedral structures

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: D2/H2 selectivity: 3.5 at low pressures, decreasing to 1.6 at 100 kPa; separation factor: 1.4 in dynamic breakthrough experiments

Other Information.Additional Info: Large pore size and high porosity facilitate rapid molecular exchange, enhancing kinetic separation efficiency. Stable under humid conditions and resistant to various solvents.
